doc.field: Time Inc. Time-Life News Service Records
Time Inc. Time-Life News Service Records

The Masthead Files contain materials from 1941 to 1947 and 1969 to 1981. Included in this series are Time mastheads and correspondence discussing masthead changes concerning Time-Life News Service staff. While the names of Time-Life News Service staff are featured on the correspondence, it is unclear who collected these materials due to the inclusion of Time editorial staff names. Time editorial staff were sometimes the senders or recipients of these pieces of correspondence. The main names featured on these documents are Libby Waite, Emily Friedrich, Betty Valentine, Katherine McNevin, Ken Shaw, Edward Jamieson, Lou Glessman, Murray Gart, Jim Ostur, Richard Seamon, Pat Newman, Dorothy O'Keefe, Pat Lambert, Susan Hake, and Linda Vartoogian.
Time Inc. Time-Life News Service Records
